output:
Usage:

./program --flag1
./program --flag2
./program --flag3
./program OTHER_FLAGS OTHER_FLAGS
./program --help
./program --version
./program --license

Arguments:

OTHER_FLAGS can be --flag4 or --flag5

 -a, --flag1                                 Intiates flag-1 mode
 -b, --flag2   <OPTION>                      Initiates flag-2 mode with OPTION argument
 -c, --flag3   <OPTION1> <OPTION2>           Initiates flag-3 mode with options 1 & 2 arguments
 -d, --flag4   <OPTION1> <OPTION2>           Initiates flag-4 mode with options 1 & 2 arguments
     --flag5   <OPTION1> <OPTION2> <OPTION3> Initiates flag-5 mode
     --help                                  shows this help message
     --license                               shows the license of this software
     --version                               shows the version of this software

This program demonstrates handling custom flags.
